parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.16

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Curator

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds or removes curator points. Points can be only in range from 0 to 1.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> curatorObj '''addCuratorPoints''' points

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> curatorObj: [[Object]] - Curator module.

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> points: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>curatorModule addCuratorPoints 0.5</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[Arma 3: Curator]], [[curatorPoints]]

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value> Can be executed only on server
</value></part></template></root>
